directions: [["Mix the tasty bits together in a small bowl, also mix the dry ingredients together in a separate small bowl."],["In a large mixing bowl, mix together the wet ingredients. Add flour and spices. Add tasty bits. Mix together."],["Bake at 350 degrees for 40-45 minutes in a greased pan."],["Mix cream cheese and butter. Add vanilla, powdered sugar, and a little pinapple juice if desired, mix well to create the frosting."],["Frost and enjoy."],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
notes: Do NOT put raisins in this cake. Only monsters put raisins in carrot cake.
